titleStmt.title: The marriners card and compass. Or The best way to attain heaven amidst a sinfull and crooked generation. By William Harvey, minister of the Word
titleStmt.author: Harvey, William, fl. 1657-1705.

notesStmt.note: Heading on p. 1 reads: John. 14. 6. I am the way, the truth, and the life.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Wing reel guide incorrectly lists item as located at 2030:18.
